import { useState } from "react"; import { useFetchPricingCurrencyQuery, useFetchPricingTierQuery } from "services/courses"; import classNames from "classnames"; export const Pricing = () => { const { data: currencies } = useFetchPricingCurrencyQuery() const { data: tiers} = useFetchPricingCurrencyQuery() const { toggleCurrency, setToggleCurrency} = useState(false) const { toggleTier, setToggleTier} = useState(false) return (

Please select the price tier for your course below and click 'Save'.

    {currencies && currencies.map(currency => (
  • {currency.display}
    • ))}
  • Select
    • {tiers && tiers.map((tier, index) => (
  • {tier.display} (tier {index + 1})
    • ))}

); }; export default Pricing
